title: 47 - Why People Are Leaving The Church Part 1
description:
In this episode @IzziRay joins us to discuss a blog posted two years ago called, "Church, Here’s Why People Are Leaving You. Part 1" from John Pavlovitz, a pastor in North Carolina.  The article went viral and we feel confident this issue is still present today.  Enjoy!

Read the original blog post here: http://johnpavlovitz.com/2014/08/15/church-heres-why-people-are-leaving-you-part-1/

Learn more about Izzi Ray:
www.izziray.com

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
